summary: To obtain employment as an entry level Chemical Engineer utilizing my current experience and education.

experience.title: Chemical Engineering Intern
experience.description: Intern at AkzoNobel, assigned to the Columbus, Mississippi plant working 30-40 hours weekly in the Hydrogen Peroxide division. Responsibilities included observing processes (hydrogenation, oxidation, extraction, distillation, mixing, and loading of peroxide and its components); updating the OAM, MES, and OEE portals daily; gathering quotes and product specifications for assigned projects; red-lining P&IDs for plant changes; assisting with tasks for supervisor; leading Management of Change meetings. Projects included replacing an automatic valve with a control valve on a condensate tank with a differential pressure transmitter to control tank level; installing an orifice plate to control flow; obtaining bids for mechanical, electrical, and instrumentation labor and DCS configuration; project scopes around $50,000. Also installed an RF Capacitance probe on a sight glass and replaced a chemical hose with 316L pipe and a control valve to manage interface level; scopes estimated at $30,000-$50,000.

experience.title: Chemical Engineering Summer School
experience.description: Chemical Engineering Summer School (ChESS Vienna): practical exploration of unit operations in lab-scale settings, tours of chemical facilities in Vienna; goals included improving teamwork, presentation and laboratory skills, global awareness, and effectiveness in international settings.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering
